message.body: Hi!! I just called and it's Ingrid and I was just wondering if you still thought you were playing last tonight?! Maybe around 10? Miss ya!
Hey! I am, probably around then. Just a heads-up though, it's my band from High School doing a reunion show, and we are/were a pop rock band
I just might not make it bc Alec and I are in bmore now but have nothing to do until then so we are just driving around
:) but I def wanted to see you guys! I love reunion shows lol
Wish you guys played earlier :( if I miss you, I will Def come down for your next show
Ok! I didn't want you back show up expecting Hive Bent haha. It'd be awesome to see you if you do come down, though!
Lol no no, I read the whole fb event page like a facebook pro
